Uses of Package
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis

Packages that use org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis
Package
Description
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.cli.cmd
Commands to run LIRICAL in different configurations.
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core
Core functionality of the LIRICAL algorithm.
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis
A high-level representation of LIRICAL analysis.
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis.impl
Default LIRICAL analysis implementation.
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.output
Base data model for writing out the results of LIRICAL analysis.
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.io.analysis
Read user input formatted as a v1 or v2 phenopacket.
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.io.output
Classes for writing out LIRICAL analysis results into HTML, TSV, and JSON files.
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.io.output.svg
Classes to create an SVG graphic representing the result of likelihood raio analysis of one HPO Case.
  • Classes in org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis used by org.monarchinitiative.lirical.cli.cmd
    Class
    Description
    LiricalParseException
    An exception thrown when user-provided input is invalid.
  • Classes in org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis used by org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core
    Class
    Description
    LiricalAnalysisRunner
    The analysis runner runs LIRICAL analysis on provided analysis subject (AnalysisData).
  • Classes in org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis used by org.monarchinitiative.lirical.core.analysis
    Class
    Description
    AnalysisData
    Representation of subject data required by LIRICAL analysis.
    AnalysisOptions
    A container for analysis-specific settings, i.e.
    AnalysisOptions.Builder
    A builder for AnalysisOptions.
    AnalysisResults
    A container for the likelihood ratio test results.
    LiricalAnalysisException
    An exception thrown by LiricalAnalysisRunner if the analysis cannot be run.
    TestResult
    This class organizes information about the result of a test.
